verses.text_plain: And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem, he gathered of the house of Judah and Benjamin an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men, which were warriors, to fight against Israel, that he might bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam.
verses.verse_html: 1And when Rehoboam was come to Jerusalem, he gathered of the house of Judah and Benjamin an hundred and fourscore thousand chosen men, which were warriors, to fight against Israel, that he might bring the kingdom again to Rehoboam.

verses.text_plain: But the word of the Lord came to Shemaiah the man of God, saying,
verses.verse_html: 2But the word of the Lord came to Shemaiah the man of God, saying,

verses.text_plain: Speak unto Rehoboam the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and to all Israel in Judah and Benjamin, saying,
verses.verse_html: 3Speak unto Rehoboam the son of Solomon, king of Judah, and to all Israel in Judah and Benjamin, saying,

verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord, Ye shall not go up, nor fight against your brethren: return every man to his house: for this thing is done of me. And they obeyed the words of the Lord, and returned from going against Jeroboam.
verses.verse_html: 4Thus saith the Lord, Ye shall not go up, nor fight against your brethren: return every man to his house: for this thing is done of me. And they obeyed the words of the Lord, and returned from going against Jeroboam.

verses.text_plain: And Rehoboam dwelt in Jerusalem, and built cities for defence in Judah.
verses.verse_html: 5And Rehoboam dwelt in Jerusalem, and built cities for defence in Judah.

verses.text_plain: He built even Bethlehem, and Etam, and Tekoa,
verses.verse_html: 6He built even Bethlehem, and Etam, and Tekoa,

verses.text_plain: And Bethzur, and Shoco, and Adullam,
verses.verse_html: 7And Bethzur, and Shoco, and Adullam,

verses.text_plain: And Gath, and Mareshah, and Ziph,
verses.verse_html: 8And Gath, and Mareshah, and Ziph,

verses.text_plain: And Adoraim, and Lachish, and Azekah,
verses.verse_html: 9And Adoraim, and Lachish, and Azekah,

verses.text_plain: And Zorah, and Aijalon, and Hebron, which are in Judah and in Benjamin fenced cities.
verses.verse_html: 10And Zorah, and Aijalon, and Hebron, which are in Judah and in Benjamin fenced cities.

verses.text_plain: And he fortified the strong holds, and put captains in them, and store of victual, and of oil and wine.
verses.verse_html: 11And he fortified the strong holds, and put captains in them, and store of victual, and of oil and wine.

verses.text_plain: And in every several city he put shields and spears, and made them exceeding strong, having Judah and Benjamin on his side.
verses.verse_html: 12And in every several city he put shields and spears, and made them exceeding strong, having Judah and Benjamin on his side.

verses.text_plain: And the priests and the Levites that were in all Israel resorted to him out of all their coasts.
verses.verse_html:
13And the priests and the Levites that were in all Israel resorted to him out of all their coasts.
 resorted: Heb. presented themselves to him

tokens.text: to him out of all their coasts

footnotes.body_text: resorted: Heb. presented themselves to him
footnotes.body_html: resorted: Heb. presented themselves to him

verses.text_plain: For the Levites left their suburbs and their possession, and came to Judah and Jerusalem: for Jeroboam and his sons had cast them off from executing the priests office unto the Lord:
verses.verse_html: 14For the Levites left their suburbs and their possession, and came to Judah and Jerusalem: for Jeroboam and his sons had cast them off from executing the priests office unto the Lord:

verses.text_plain: And he ordained him priests for the high places, and for the devils, and for the calves which he had made.
verses.verse_html: 15And he ordained him priests for the high places, and for the devils, and for the calves which he had made.

verses.text_plain: And after them out of all the tribes of Israel such as set their hearts to seek the Lord God of Israel came to Jerusalem, to sacrifice unto the Lord God of their fathers.
verses.verse_html: 16And after them out of all the tribes of Israel such as set their hearts to seek the Lord God of Israel came to Jerusalem, to sacrifice unto the Lord God of their fathers.

tokens.text: them out of all the tribes

verses.text_plain: So they strengthened the kingdom of Judah, and made Rehoboam the son of Solomon strong, three years: for three years they walked in the way of David and Solomon.
verses.verse_html: 17So they strengthened the kingdom of Judah, and made Rehoboam the son of Solomon strong, three years: for three years they walked in the way of David and Solomon.

verses.text_plain: And Rehoboam took him Mahalath the daughter of Jerimoth the son of David to wife, and Abihail the daughter of Eliab the son of Jesse;
verses.verse_html: 18And Rehoboam took him Mahalath the daughter of Jerimoth the son of David to wife, and Abihail the daughter of Eliab the son of Jesse;

verses.text_plain: Which bare him children; Jeush, and Shamariah, and Zaham.
verses.verse_html: 19Which bare him children; Jeush, and Shamariah, and Zaham.

verses.text_plain: And after her he took Maachah the daughter of Absalom; which bare him Abijah, and Attai, and Ziza, and Shelomith.
verses.verse_html:
20And after her he took Maachah the daughter of Absalom; which bare him Abijah, and Attai, and Ziza, and Shelomith.
 Maachah: she is also called Michaiah the daughter of Uriel

footnotes.body_text: Maachah: she is also called Michaiah the daughter of Uriel
footnotes.body_html: Maachah: she is also called Michaiah the daughter of Uriel

verses.text_plain: And Rehoboam loved Maachah the daughter of Absalom above all his wives and his concubines: (for he took eighteen wives, and threescore concubines; and begat twenty and eight sons, and threescore daughters.)
verses.verse_html: 21And Rehoboam loved Maachah the daughter of Absalom above all his wives and his concubines: (for he took eighteen wives, and threescore concubines; and begat twenty and eight sons, and threescore daughters.)

verses.text_plain: And Rehoboam made Abijah the son of Maachah the chief, to be ruler among his brethren: for he thought to make him king.
verses.verse_html: 22And Rehoboam made Abijah the son of Maachah the chief, to be ruler among his brethren: for he thought to make him king.

verses.text_plain: And he dealt wisely, and dispersed of all his children throughout all the countries of Judah and Benjamin, unto every fenced city: and he gave them victual in abundance. And he desired many wives.
verses.verse_html:
23And he dealt wisely, and dispersed of all his children throughout all the countries of Judah and Benjamin, unto every fenced city: and he gave them victual in abundance. And he desired many wives.
 many wives: Heb. a multitude of wives

footnotes.body_text: many wives: Heb. a multitude of wives
footnotes.body_html: many wives: Heb. a multitude of wives
